text: The Twin Sister is a 1915 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Mae Hotely - Eva Bolt/Nancy, her twin sister * Oliver Hardy - Bill Bolt ==See also== * List of American films of 1915 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1915 films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1915 comedy films Category:1915 short films Category:Films directed by Arthur Hotaling Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: The Twin Sister
